Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of Padiamun(nebnesuttawy?) with a lappet-wig, a modelled face with a beard and large joined hands in relief; the front of the leg section is inscribed with black painted Hieroglyphs; there is a back-pillar and a plinth beneath the foot.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Somerset Lowry-Corry, 2nd Earl of Belmore
